description:
A simple, secure, decentralized VPN mesh network solution


This is a bugfix version.
- fix peer rpc compatibility issue. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/548
- avoid disconnecting when bandwidth is fully occupied. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/549
- improve performance of udp subnet proxy. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/552
- allow manually specify public address of listeners. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/556
- tcp accept should retry when encoutering some kinds of error. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/565
- persistent machine_id if it's generated randomly. by @KKRainbow in https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/pull/565
Full Changelog: https://github.com/EasyTier/EasyTier/compare/v2.1.1...v2.1.2
